name: Toothpaste!
description:
Create bridges, push tires, and work together to make it through. A very short game with only three levels, but it's a game that I hope you enjoy!
The instructions and controls are found in-game.

The music was created for this game by http://beadysea.bandcamp.com/! 
Thank you to DrLonePony for helping with the export process!

And remember to brush your teeth.
